title.narrative: Promoting intergenerational self-help approach to improve the well-being of disadvantaged groups in Vietnam

description.narrative: To establish 60 ISHCs (Inter-generational Self-Help Clubs) in 2 provinces and provision of IGAs (income generating activities), health, enhancing accesses through community monitoring mechanism

mailing-address.narrative: Tavis House, 1-6 Tavistock Square, London WC1H 9NA
